definition: to flatten/to smooth down/to unwrinkle/(fig.) to soothe (emotional wounds)/to heal (scars)
to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Wanying smoothed the fragments patiently and reordered them together. Then she attentively read the letter twice.
sentences.chinese: 宛英耐心抚平团皱的碎片，一一拼上，仔细读了两遍。

sentences.english: The emotional wounds of early childhood leave ineradicable scars.
sentences.chinese: 童年早期的情感创伤留下了难以抚平的伤痕。

sentences.english: The mind needs to comfort, smooths all distortions and sad happy.
sentences.chinese: 心灵更需要抚慰，抚平所有扭曲和悲喜。

sentences.english: WenYan resolution must hands-on assistance mother smooths the heart pain.
sentences.chinese: 文彦决议一定要亲手协助母亲抚平心里的伤痛。

sentences.english: Hydrate, smooth and plump for a soft radiant complexion.
sentences.chinese: 与水化合，抚平和柔亮肤色。

sentences.english: Let the time heal my hurt.
The various recreational facilities for cruise you turn travel Lawton.
sentences.chinese: 邮轮上的各种娱乐设施为您抚平旅途劳顿。

sentences.english: His love celebrates her victories and soothes her wounds.
sentences.chinese: 他的爱庆祝她的胜利，也抚平她的创伤。

sentences.english: He'll stroke his tie or smooth a lapel.
sentences.chinese: 他会抹领带，或是抚平上衣衣领。

sentences.english: A moisturiser will help temporarily smooth away some early fine lines.
sentences.chinese: 润肤霜会有助于暂时抚平一些早期细纹。

sentences.english: My heart is aching so; Thy gracious balm I need.
sentences.chinese: 用你天恩的膏油，抚平我伤痛的心。

sentences.english: Desalt all kinds of splashes and smooth tiny wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 淡化各种色斑，抚平细小皱纹。

sentences.english: Quickly smooth coarse and messy hair, present silky and flying charm of straight hair.
sentences.chinese: 快速抚平毛糙乱翘的秀发，展现直发柔顺飞扬的魅力。

sentences.english: Simply spray them on your clothes and smooth the surface with your hands.
sentences.chinese: 只需简单将喷雾喷在衣物上然后用手抚平即可。

sentences.english: The time will smooth all scars.
The multi- encouragements, the multi- contacts, smoothes their mind with the compassion the wound.
sentences.chinese: 多鼓励，多接触，用爱心去抚平他们心灵的创伤。

definition: to pacify/to calm down/to be cured/to be healed
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
to relieve/to ease (pressure)/to alleviate/to remove/to get rid of
to cause a wound to close up and heal
